    • Uses of Group in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupMembership Account.addGroup(Group group)
      Assigns this account to the specified Group.
      boolean Account.isMemberOfGroup(Group group)
      Returns true if the account belongs to a group, false otherwise.
      Account Account.removeGroup(Group group)
      Removes this account from the specified Group.

    • Uses of Group in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group that return Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Group GroupMembership.getGroup()
      Returns this membership's Group resource.
      Group CreateGroupRequest.getGroup()
      Returns the Group instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.
      Group Group.removeAccount(Account account)
      Removes this Group's association with the specified Account.
      Group Group.removeAccount(String hrefOrEmailOrUsername)
      Removes this Group's association with the specified Account represented by its (case insensitive) username, email or href .
      Group Group.saveWithResponseOptions(GroupOptions responseOptions)
      Saves this Group resource and ensures the returned Group response reflects the specified options.
      Group Group.setDescription(String description)
      Sets the group's description.
      Group Group.setName(String name)
      Sets the group's name, which must be unique among all other groups within a Directory.
      Group Group.setStatus(GroupStatus status)
      Sets the Group's status.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CreateGroupRequestBuilder Groups.newCreateRequestFor(Group group)
